response.overview: Written by Dr. Nicanor Tiongson, this musical play foregrounds the legal and democratic heroism of Apolinario Mabini. Mabining Mandirigma once again promises audience to an exciting journey through history as it utilizes steampunk, a subgenre of science fiction that incorporates technology and aesthetic designs inspired by 19th century industrial steam-powered machinery, as a fitting backdrop to an already action-packed musical.
response.title: Mabining Mandirigma
